column4: Can someone give me a step by step installation of ubuntu (in a PM)?
unfortunately we don't help people by PM here :( do you know why?
unfortunately we don't help people by PM here :( do you know why?
because we want to help everyone equally.
when people start breaking off into PM, then trolling is harder to prevent.  Also, when things go on in public, more people can read and learn.
did you try reading the excellent documentation on the ubuntu website?
